title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: We weren't pathetic andbourgeois. (I cringe as I write that word; only astudent wanker uses it, but that's how I felt.)So Joanne and I climbed up the steps in silence,the round ornate pillars of the Dugald StewartMonument towering above on our left. A youngishcunt in an auld gadge's bunnet passed us as wesaw the big, phallic Nelson Monument loom ahead;it reminded me why we were ascending this hill.
